title: Crazy For You
lyrics:
[intro, pick around] | (G)  (Em) | (G)  (Em) | (C)  (C) | (D)  (C) |
 
(G)Found myself today singin' (Em) out loud your name
You said (C)I'm crazy, if I (D)am I'm (C)crazy for (G)you (Em)  (G)  (Em)
 
(G)Sometimes sittin' in the dark (Em)wishin' you were here turns me (C)crazy
But it's (D)you who makes me (C)lose my (G)head (Em)  (G)  (Em)
 
And (G)everytime I'm meant to be (Em)acting sensible
You (C)drift into my head and turn me (D)into a (C)crumblin' (G)fool (Em)  (G)  (Em)
          
(A7)Tell me to run and I'll race, if you (Am7)want me to stop I'll freeze
And if you (G7)and me are gonna leave, just hold me (A7)closer baby [pause]
(N/C) And make me
 
(C)Cra-a-a-a-(D)a-azy for (G)you (Em)  (G)  (Em)
(C)Cra-a-a-a-(D)a-azy for (G)you (Em)  (G)  (Em)
 
(G)Lately with this state I'm in I (Em)can't help myself but spin
I (C)wish you'd come over, (D)send me spinnin' (C)closer to (G)you (Em)  (G)  (Em)
 
(G)My oh my how my blood boils, a (Em)sweet taste for you
(C)Strips me down bare and gets me (D)into my fa(C)vorite mood (G)  (Em)  (G)  (Em)
 
I keep on (G)tryin', fightin' these (Em)feelings away
But the (C)more I do, the (D)crazier I (C)turn into (G)  (Em)  (G)  (Em)
 
(A7)Pacin' floors and (Am7)openin' doors (G7)hopin' you'll walk through
And (A7)save me boy [pause]
(N/C) Because i'm tooooooo
 
(C)Cra-a-a-a-(D)a-azy for (G)you (Em)  (G)  (Em)
(C)Cra-a-a-a-(D)a-azy for (G)you (Em)  (G)  (Em)  (G-single strum) [end]
